alert.note: Alert for Pike (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 9:17PM EDT until July 13 at 10:15PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Pike County in northeastern Pennsylvania... * Until 1015 PM EDT. * At 917 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Blooming Grove to near Dingmans Ferry, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Blooming Grove, Shohola, Matamoras, Milford, Greeley, Pecks Pond, Dingmans Ferry, Millrift, Twin Lakes and Lords Valley. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
